root: ^(Huh, did someone leave their computer behind...?)
^(I think they might've left it on... It doesn't seem to be in great condition.)
^(That's odd, why does it look like it has legs?)
^(One of them looks to be banged up pretty bad, too...)
^(Hm, I wonder... I always needed a new computer...)
^It's rude to touch someone without asking, you know.
^Sorry about my reaction, I'm just, well... New to all of this, y'know?
^You'll get used to it eventually. I'm here every week.
^(He adjusts himself in his seat, attempting to fix his slumped posture. The sound of loose screws and metal fills the room...)
^Are... are you okay? Your leg is--
^It's been like this for approximately 3 weeks now.
^Three weeks? Have you been to the doct--
^No. I can't afford a repair. It's not covered by Tundra Insurance Policy.

c-0: ^Tundra Enterprise was founded by the wonderful and amazing and beautiful Mister Pierre Beverly!
^What started as a humble garage start-up in the technology industry rapidly evolved into the most profitable corporation on the entirety of MX-3319!
^Tundra Enterprise has since evolved to be more than just a tech company, however. It has since expanded far beyond that!
^Multimedia, General Goods, Hardware, Software, Groceries, Business, Health, Furniture, Science, Home & Auto, Robotics, New Life--
^The possibilities are infinite when you shop with Tundra! It's chilling how cheap it is! Would you like to sign up for a one-hour free trial?
^A FATAL EXCEPTION HAS OCCURED AT R2 FUNCTION 000E0.
c-1: ^Augh! I can't stand this stupid thing anymore!
^I can't say anything without this stupid protocol taking over!
^So... Uh... I take it you're a robot for Tundra Enterprise?
^I am a human organism that has been, well...
^Yes. I used to be a normal, flesh and bones human.
^But Tundra has ravaged MX-3319 so much that it's near impossible for organic life to live there without their own augmentation.
^There's no choice but to essentially sell yourself into servitude, so they can make you into a robotic body that can actually live.
^All while you work for them until you rust, paying off the service that they give you no choice but to get unless you want to die!
^(...Guess some worlds aren't too different from mine, heh...)
c-2: ^Tundra Enterprise was founded by the wonderful and amazing and beautiful Mister Pierre Beverly!
^I, uh, think I'm just gonna, go do some dishes now, uh...
^What started as a humble garage start-up in the technology industry rapidly evolved into the most profitable corporation on the entirety of MX-3319!
^Just, uh, call me over when you're... Done?
